com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts

Class StrutsDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.struts.StrutsDelegate

  • public class StrutsDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    StrutsDelegate defines a set of helper operations for working with the Struts API. Implementations should conform to the same design as servlets an actions classes in that they should be thread-safe and should not maintain client state.

      • forwardParam

        public ActionForward forwardParam(ActionForward base,
                         java.lang.String param,
                         java.lang.String value)
        Take an action forward and toss on a form variable.
        Parameters:
        base - Base ActionForward
        param - Parameter to be added to the ActionForward url.
        value - Value of parameter to be added.
        Returns:
        a new ActionForward with the path of the base appended with the param and value.

      • getTextAreaValue

        public java.lang.String getTextAreaValue(DynaActionForm form,
                                java.lang.String name)
        Use this for every textarea that we use in our UI. Otherwise you will get ^M in your file showing up.
        Parameters:
        form - to fetch from
        name - of value in form
        Returns:
        String without CR in them.

      • readDatePicker

        public java.util.Date readDatePicker(DynaActionForm form,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            int yearDirection)
        Reads the earliest date from a form populated by a datepicker. Your dyna action picker must either be a struts datePickerForm, or possess all of datePickerForm's fields.
        Parameters:
        form - The datePickerForm
        name - The prefix for the date picker form fields, usually "date"
        yearDirection - One of DatePicker's year range static variables.
        Returns:
        The earliest date to schedule actions.
        See Also:
        DatePicker

      • rememberDatePicker

        public void rememberDatePicker(java.util.Map requestParams,
                      DynaActionForm form,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      int yearDirection)
        Writes the values of a date picker form to the requestParams for remembering form values across requests. Your dyna action picker must either be a struts datePickerForm, or possess all of datePickerForm's fields.
        Parameters:
        requestParams - The map to which to copy form fields
        form - The datePickerForm
        name - The prefix for the date picker form fields, usually "date"
        yearDirection - One of DatePicker's year range static variables.
        See Also:
        DatePicker

      • prepopulateDatePicker

        public DatePicker prepopulateDatePicker(HttpServletRequest request,
                               DynaActionForm form,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               int yearDirection)
        Creates a date picker object with the given name and prepopulates the date with values from the given request's parameters. Prepopulates the form with these values as well. Your dyna action picker must either be a struts datePickerForm, or possess all of datePickerForm's fields.
        Parameters:
        request - The request from which to get initial form field values.
        form - The datePickerForm
        name - The prefix for the date picker form fields, usually "date"
        yearDirection - One of DatePicker's year range static variables.
        Returns:
        The created and prepopulated date picker object
        See Also:
        DatePicker
